alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 415 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Kalispell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whitefish and Columbia Falls. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 132 and 133. Highway 93 N between mile markers 117 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
